patthana14.17:1.1: Āsavañceva āsavasampayuttañca dhammaṃ paṭicca naāsavo ceva naāsavavippayutto ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana14.17:2.1: Āsavasampayuttañceva no ca āsavaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naāsavavippayutto ceva nano ca āsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana14.17:3.1: Āsavañceva āsavasampayuttañca āsavavippayuttañceva no ca āsavañca dhammaṃ paṭicca noāsavo ceva naāsavavippayutto ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
